attributes.action: Mps & House Of Lords To Have Credit Checks & Police Crime Checks
attributes.additional_details:
Mps & House Of Lords To Have Credit Checks & Police Crime Checks.
We should know the back ground checks of all mps & house of lords - from youth crime's to crime spent to even mental health back ground to bulimic - drug - drink gambling to even banning child sex offenders from mps & house of lords job roles.
Why should mps & house of lords not meet there same police & credit checks to prove there good .
We see report about child abuse in politics - mps - lords how did they ever get employed with in government departments in the first place.
